major_findings.title: Foreign keys not enforced
major_findings.description: PRAGMA foreign_keys is not enabled in DB or Code
major_findings.recommendation: Enable foreign key constraints in connection settings

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'platform_events.entity_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'entity_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for entity_id

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'platform_events.actor_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'actor_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for actor_id

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'hcm_reward_point_transactions.reference_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'reference_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for reference_id

major_findings.title: Unenforced Foreign Key: 'hcm_promotion_approvals.approver_id'
major_findings.description: Column 'approver_id' suggests a relation but has no FK constraint.
major_findings.recommendation: Add FOREIGN KEY constraint for approver_id

major_findings.title: Could not load FastAPI app
major_findings.description: Failed to import 'app' from backend.main for inspection. This is expected if optional dependencies are missing.
major_findings.recommendation: Ensure all dependencies are installed. Run: pip install -r backend/requirements.txt

major_findings.recommendation: Use '@/' path aliases for cleaner imports.

major_findings.title: Missing Module Entry Point
major_findings.recommendation: Add 'index.tsx' as the public entry point for the module.

major_findings.title: Low Theme Centralization
major_findings.description: Very few components are interacting with ThemeContext/useTheme.
major_findings.recommendation: Utilize useTheme hook for dynamic styling and theme consistency.

major_findings.title: Standard Component Underutilization
major_findings.description: Many components appear to use raw HTML instead of core UI components.
major_findings.recommendation: Replace raw HTML elements with standardized components from '@/components/ui'.

major_findings.title: 29 components lack critical accessibility attributes
major_findings.description: Missing aria-labels or alt text on interactive/media elements.
major_findings.recommendation: Add ARIA labels and alt text to improve accessibility compliance.

major_findings.title: Insufficient input validation on AI calls
major_findings.description: Not all AI integrations validate input data (0/2)
major_findings.recommendation: Add schema validation before sending data to AI models

major_findings.title: Unsafe AI Temperature Settings
major_findings.description: Found 1 AI calls without explicit low-temperature settings (risk of hallucinations).
major_findings.recommendation: Set temperature=0.0-0.2 for factual tasks.

major_findings.title: Missing Grounding Instructions
major_findings.description: Found 1 AI prompts without grounding constraints.
major_findings.recommendation: Include 'only use provided context' or similar constraints in prompts.

major_findings.title: Missing Response Validation
major_findings.description: Found 2 AI calls without response validation.
major_findings.recommendation: Implement schema validation or parsing for AI outputs to catch malformed responses.

major_findings.title: No deployment scripts found
major_findings.recommendation: Create deployment scripts (start_app.bat/sh, Dockerfile)

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'core_organizations'
minor_findings.description: Table has 31 columns (threshold: 20)
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'hcm_employees'
minor_findings.description: Table has 54 columns (threshold: 20)
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'system_flags'
minor_findings.description: Table has 32 columns (threshold: 20)
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'payroll_settings'
minor_findings.description: Table has 22 columns (threshold: 20)
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'notification_settings'
minor_findings.description: Table has 33 columns (threshold: 20)
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'hcm_payroll_runs'
minor_findings.description: Table has 21 columns (threshold: 20)
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Potential Denormalization: 'hcm_payroll_ledger'
minor_findings.description: Table has 33 columns (threshold: 20)
minor_findings.recommendation: Consider standardizing schema or splitting tables.

minor_findings.title: Incomplete AI error handling
minor_findings.description: Some AI calls lack proper error handling (1/2)
minor_findings.recommendation: Wrap AI calls in try-catch with fallback logic

minor_findings.title: Missing Security Policy
minor_findings.description: SECURITY.md file found in root.
minor_findings.recommendation: Add a SECURITY.md to define reporting procedures.
